snippet.title: Mario Kart 8 - DLC Pack 2 Teaser Trailer (Wii U) 60 FPS
snippet.description:
Get a quick look at the full content of the second DLC pack for Mario Kart 8, drifting in on 23rd April 2015 on Wii U.

Mario Kart 8 is available here: http://ow.ly/D9CMx
Mario Kart 8 DLC info: http://ow.ly/D9D13
Official Website: http://nintendo.co.uk/mariokart
Online Store: http://store.nintendo.co.uk
Facebook Mario Kart: https://www.facebook.com/MarioKart
Facebook Wii U: https://www.facebook.com/WiiU.co.uk
Facebook Nintendo 3DS: https://www.facebook.com/Nintendo3dsUK
Twitter Nintendo UK: https://twitter.com/NintendoUK
YouTube Nintendo UK: http://ow.ly/pcJxF
